name: X-Ray (James Darnell)
description: James Darnell, along with his sister, was among the small group led by engineer Simon Utrecht to simulate the crash that gave the Fantastic Four their powers, and has remained with the U-Foes ever since.

wiki.powers: His physical form has been permanently converted into quasi-solid radiation. He can levitate and project various wavelengths of radiation. He is also invulnerable to physical injury.
wiki.bio_text: X-Ray's history prior to being recruited as a propulsion engineer by [[Vector|Simon Utrecht]] has yet to be revealed. He, along with his [[Vapor|sister]], was among the small group led by Utrecht to simulate the crash that gave the Fantastic Four their powers, and has remained with the [[U-Foes]] ever since.
wiki.bio:
X-Ray's history prior to being recruited as a propulsion engineer by [[Vector|Simon Utrecht]] has yet to be revealed. He, along with his [[Vapor|sister]], was among the small group led by Utrecht to simulate the crash that gave the Fantastic Four their powers, and has remained with the [[U-Foes]] ever since.

Alongside his teammates, he has had encounters with [[Hulk (Bruce Banner)|Hulk]], [[Avengers]], [[Spider-Man (Peter Parker)|Spider-Man]], [[Crossfire]], [[Puma]], [[Darkhawk]], and [[Portal]].
